name: perl-xml-simple

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: An API for simple XML files

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-xml-parser
dependencies.description: XML::Parser - A perl module for parsing XML documents

dependent_to.name: prokka
dependent_to.description:
Prokka is a software tool to annotate bacterial, archaeal and viral
genomes quickly and produce standards-compliant output files.

dependent_to.name: meme
dependent_to.description:
The MEME Suite allows the biologist to discover novel motifs in
collections of unaligned nucleotide or protein sequences, and to perform
a wide variety of other motif-based analyses.

dependent_to.name: perl-bio-eutilities
dependent_to.description: BioPerl low-level API for retrieving and storing data from NCBI eUtils

dependent_to.name: entrezdirect
dependent_to.description:
Entrez Direct (EDirect) provides access to the NCBI's suite of
interconnected databases (publication, sequence, structure, gene,
variation, expression, etc.) from a UNIX terminal window.
